Headline: Howard bound Red Line Service Delayed at Wilson
ShortDescription: Howard Red Line trains are standing at Wilson due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard Red Line trains are standing at Wilson due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute near 111th/Morgan
ShortDescription: 111th/King Dr. buses temp. rerouted SB:111th, Halsted, 107th, Throop and 111th; NB:111th, Marshfield, 115th and Halsted: due to, st blockage near 111th/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 111th/Morgan, due to street blockage near 111th/Morgan.

Southbound buses will operate via 111th, Halsted, 107th, Throop and 111th and including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via 111th, Marshfield, 115th, Halsted and 111th. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Addison/Clark
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses temp. rerouted EB: Addison/Racine, Belmont, Halsted & Addison; WB Addison/Halsted, Belmont, Racine & Addison due to street near Addison/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Addison/Clark due to street blockage near Addison/Clark.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Addison/Racine, Belmont, Halsted & Addison
  • Westbound buses will operate via Addison/Halsted, Belmont, Racine & Addison

Allow extra travel time.
